TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit OutputCache extends System.Object
public ref class OutputCache abstract sealed

summary.span: Provides programmatic access to the output-cache providers that are specified in the configuration file for a Web site.

span.span: Provides programmatic access to the output-cache providers that are specified in the configuration file for a Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 輸出快取在記憶體中儲存的網頁、 控制項和 HTTP 回應所產生的輸出。Output caching stores the generated output of pages, controls, and HTTP responses in memory. 輸出快取可讓您快取不同版本的內容，根據查詢字串和表單張貼參數的頁面、 瀏覽器類型或使用者的語言。Output caching enables you to cache different versions of content depending on the query string and on form-post parameters to a page, on browser type, or on the language of the user. 您可以設定 ASP.NET 快取輸出快取項目，針對特定的期間。You can configure ASP.NET to cache an output-cache entry for a specific period. 您也可以設定 ASP.NET 收回快取項目會自動根據外部事件例如取決於快取的資料庫中的變更。You can also configure ASP.NET to evict a cache entry automatically based on an external event such as changes in the database that the cache depends on. 類別可讓您擴充輸出快取。The class enables you to extend output caching. 例如，您可以設定一或多個自訂輸出快取提供者的其他存放裝置，例如本機或遠端磁碟、 資料庫、 雲端存放裝置和分散式快取引擎為目標。For example, you can configure one or more custom output-cache providers that target other storage devices such as local or remote disks, databases, cloud storage, and distributed cache engines.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property DefaultProviderName As String
public: static property System::String ^ DefaultProviderName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the name of the default provider that is configured for the output cache.

span.span: Gets the name of the default provider that is configured for the output cache.
The name of the default provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，所有的 HTTP 回應呈現網頁及控制項使用`AspNetInternalProvider`，記憶體中的輸出快取提供者。By default, all HTTP responses, rendered pages, and controls use `AspNetInternalProvider`, the in-memory output cache provider. 若要使用不同的提供者，`defaultProvider`屬性設定為替代的提供者的名稱。To use a different provider, set the `defaultProvider` attribute to the name of the alternative provider.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig object Deserialize(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed

summary.span: Deserializes a binary object into output-cache data.

span.span: Deserializes a binary object into output-cache data.

returns.span: An object that contains the deserialized data.

span.span: An object that contains the deserialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在部分信任下運作的輸出快取提供者會使用這個方法。This method is used by output-cache providers that are operating under partial trust.

exception.span: The deserialized object that is returned by the method is not a valid output-cache type.

span.span: The deserialized object that is returned by the method is not a valid output-cache type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Providers As OutputCacheProviderCollection

summary.span: Gets a collection of the output-cache providers that are specified in the configuration file for a Web site.

span.span: Gets a collection of the output-cache providers that are specified in the configuration file for a Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您設定一個或多個自訂輸出快取提供者的其他存放裝置，例如本機或遠端磁碟、 資料庫、 雲端存放裝置和分散式快取引擎為目標。You configure one or more custom output-cache providers that target other storage devices, such as local or remote disks, databases, cloud storage, and distributed cache engines. 若要設定自訂輸出快取提供者，您必須新增提供者對集合所表示之屬性。To configure custom output-cache providers, you add a provider to the collection that is represented by the property.
